SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice JOIN user ON user.u_no = notice.u_no WHERE notice.n_del = 0
AND notice.n_title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND notice.n_content like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND user.u_nickname like #{searchValue}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(n_title, n_content, u_no) VALUES(#{n_title}, #{n_content}, (SELECT u_no FROM user WHERE u_nickname=#{u_nickname}))
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET n_del = 1 WHERE n_no = #{n_no}
UPDATE notice SET n_title=#{n_title}, n_content=#{n_content}, n_date=current_timestamp() WHERE n_no = #{n_no} AND u_no = (SELECT u_no FROM user WHERE u_nickname=#{u_nickname})
